author: Z_wing
title: wait a minute...
review:
So you can see by looking at who this review is by that I live in the UK. If you look at the notes of this set you can see it was a promotion in germany. but I remember getting this in mcDonald's IN THE UK. How strange is that???

loudspeaker

I recommend this set to 3+'s
I hope you found my review helpful
